description: Add storage engine abstraction and config file support
context:
Add support for multiple storage backends (file, GitHub Issues, GitHub Projects v2) with system-wide configuration.

Requirements:
- Create StorageEngine interface that file/GitHub backends implement
- Add TOML config file support (~/.config/dex/dex.toml)
- Config should specify engine type and engine-specific settings
- Maintain backward compatibility with current file storage
- Config loading priority: CLI flags > env vars > config file > auto-detect

Implementation approach:
1. Create StorageEngine interface (read/write/getPath)
2. Refactor TaskStorage â†’ FileStorage implementing interface
3. Add TOML config loading (use a TOML parser library)
4. Update index.ts and TaskService to accept engine parameter
5. Add config file to .gitignore

Done when:
- StorageEngine interface exists
- FileStorage implements it
- Config file loads and selects engine
- All existing tests pass
- Can specify engine via config

Related: src/core/storage.ts, src/core/task-service.ts, src/index.ts
